mapper.select: SELECT c.user_name userName, c.phone FROM t_info_store a LEFT JOIN t_info_driver b ON b.is_delete = 0 AND a.province_id = b.province_id AND a.city_id = b.city_id AND a.area_id = b.area_id LEFT JOIN t_sys_user c ON b.driver_id = c.user_id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 AND a.user_id = #{userId}
